scripts.install: concurrently -n frontend,api-gateway,catalogue-backend,order-backend "cd frontend && npm i" "cd api-gateway && npm i" "cd catalogue-backend && npm i" "cd order-backend && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently -n frontend,api-gateway,catalogue-backend,order-backend "cd frontend && npm start" "cd api-gateway && npm start" "cd catalogue-backend && npm start" "cd order-backend && npm start"
